Actions.Text: COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO JUDICIARY

Title: Relates to surrogacy programs and arrangements
Summary: Relates to the requirements of surrogacy programs and criteria for surrogacy arrangements.
LawCode: Amd Fam Ct Act, generally; amd §123, Dom Rel L; amd §§1400, 1401, 1403 & 1404, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the family court act, the general business law and the domestic relations law, in relation to surrogacy programs and arrangements
